poem:
### Faltering Notes

A piano gathers dust,
silent under the weight
of forgotten touch.
In a corner, shadows
extend their weary hands.
We count breaths,
each a hymn to endurance,
each note a bridge
to lost seasons, 
the ghost of music
lingering,
unplayed.
